title: Great Irish Stories of the Supernatural
description: Take a country that is more richly endowed with supernatural beings than any other - banshees, ghosts, faeries, leprechauns, even devils and witches. Populate it with a race of people who are the world's most gifted storytellers. . .The result is pure magic: stories that enchant, chill or engross, that conjure up hidden worlds and sinister beings, faerie mischief and devilish spite.
author: Peter Haining
